title: Morello's mana regen feels so lackluster
body:
I know someone did the Maths and worked out that Athene's now only beats Morello's in Mana Regen when you're low on mana. And so everyone jumped on the Morello's bandwagon and to be honest so did I. But ever since I did I've been having major mana issues with champs like Syndra and Ori, issues I never had with Athene's before the changes. On the occasion that I DO build Athene's, even though the maths proves that Morello's gives more, I FEEL a lot more sustained on mana with Athene's. 

I think I might go back to Athene's. Except for champs like Lissandra and Xerath since their passives keep them pretty topped up on mana and the extra AP and Grievous Wounds would benefit them pretty well.

Anyone else feel this way?

replies.body:
I've typically always taken Morello's over Athenes.
I just like it more as an item. It gives a decent amount of AP and has an amazing passive.
Then again I'm pretty good at managing my mana too, so the lower mana regen before these preseason changes never bothered me.
